Articles.Content:
No, no, no, nononononononononono. I won't press the button. If everyone dies, Who'll be there to worship me?

By pressing this button, you will be happy/have pleasure for as long as you live. The downside is that what you'll experience won't be "real".

YES!

By pressing the button, you will gain a clone of yourself.

Pros: A clone of yourself

Cons: Clone revolts and whatnot

Done. Thrice, actually. Now, I can be an animator, quantum physicist, video game programmer, _and_ mechanical engineer all at the same time! Thank you for the blessing! (Wait, did you mean real scientific clone, or sci-fi clone? Do I get three baby versions of me or three exact duplicates of me as I am right now? Crap.)

By pressing the button, you rediscover the Starlite material. But, the person you dislike the most (someone you actually know in person) takes the credit (Includes money, fame)

Edited October 20, 2015 by NeatCrown

sure then.

press button it recieve SSD.

Uhm, sure, KSP loads slow anyway.

Ve haf calculated ze noombars, and if you prayss zis button, it vill make you KSP master. Danny then import you into game, and you become rocket tester.

No thanks. I'd rather be teleported into the Just Cause 2 or Rollercoaster Tycoon 2 world.

Press the button to release a rat into a maze which will actuate a lever that will close a relay to trigger a computer to activate a circuit that will make a radiation ray fire upon you and give you the ability to create anything you wish out of thin air.

I push that button!

Push this button for pointless stuff to happen.

I vill push zis button.

Push ze button, become Kerbal, go to space everyday!

NOPE.AVI

press button to annoy a mod... at the expense of the mod being able to mute you for a while.

No thanks, I'm nice to moderators.

Press a button to go to Mars. Downside: No way to return.

Sure thing, i'll press that button.

Press the button to release the kraken.

I press ze button.

Press zis button to release Jebediah's might on ze Kraken. Varranty void if Jeb kills ze Kraken

I'll do that! NO MORE KRAKEN!

Pugh this button and you'll become notch.

The thing is, he's super depressed.

I need me Moinecraft moneh.

BTW I read his sad Twitter posts.

Press as button to drop a nuke some random populated place. It could land on you, but...

You'll get infinite monies!

Never!!

...Maybe...

Press this button to go fast. BUT, you can't stop.

Yesh!

All teh fasts!

Press le button to get a fully functional tank, with all repair and upkeep costs covered.

But when you die, you will become a zombie and start a zombie apocalypse.

Nope. What would I want with a tank anyway?

Press this button and live forever, knowing that someday you'll be last human alive.

Well, I could always study someone for their entire life, and make an AI based off of them.

Press this button to be the smartest person ever, but you'll never be able to do ANYHTING again besides thinking.

*Press*

Press this button to save KSP.

However, every other video game will be destroyed.

Never! My precious XCOM will not be destroyed!

Also, my 15$copy of civ 5 complete.

Press for button to appear.

Traitor! Dirty traitor!

*Presses button*

Press the button for free rockets your entire life.

However, you can only get around via rocket.

nope, that would be bad!

TUBM and I'll do a backflip. BUT NO ONE CAN SEE IT!

No answer here.

Press this button, become Jebediah, and never be able to stop smiling. You will be a BadS, but also marked as visually insane. Oh, and a side effect: You are a secret spy for the Kraken.

*Press*

Press this button to know everything.

EVERYTHING.

Think about it.

That... would be weird.

Ah, what the heck. I'll press it.
